entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
